INDX 0.01

INDX is a personal file store being developed at the University of Southampton, for the SOCIAM project.

Backbone.js

Provides the structure and documention for Backbone

Backbone.Model


extend

model.extend( [classProperties,] properties )
line 20
To create a Model class of your own, you extend Backbone.Model and /// provide instance properties, as well as optional classProperties to be /// attached directly to the constructor function.

Arguments:
  1. classProperties
  2. properties

initialize

model.initialize( [options,] [attributes] )
line 25
When creating an instance of a model, you can pass in the initial values of the attributes, which will be set on the model. If you define an initialize function, it will be invoked when the model is created.

Arguments:
  1. options
  2. attributes

Returns:
